alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 4:12AM CST until January 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches are expected, with the highest totals across the northern half of Ford and Iroquois counties. * WHERE...Iroquois and Ford Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation may begin as rain before transitioning to snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
